pullRequest.body:
Define spectral spaces and prove that a quasi-compact open of a spectral space is spectral.


---

nodes.body: Sorry for the long delay, I decided to hand it over completely.
I believe this would be a nice PR to work on for algebraic geometry people beginning with Lean.

> Sorry for the long delay, I decided to hand it over completely.

Thanks, @pangelinos, hopefully we'll find someone to continue this!

This PR looks mostly fine, but there are still some places where it needs some work. Are you planning to continue working on this PR? Would you like some help from others, or do you want to hand over completely? (In the latter case, please label it with `please-adopt`.)

This PR looks mostly fine, but there are still some places where it needs some work. Are you planning to continue working on this PR? Would you like some help from others, or do you want to hand over completely? (In the latter case, please label it with `please-adopt`.)

```suggestion
variable {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y] {f : X → Y}

open TopologicalSpace

/-- Let X be an open subspace of a topological space Y. If the quasi-compact opens
of Y form a basis of Y, then the quasi-compact opens of X form a basis of X.-/
theorem OpenEmbedding.has_qcOpenBasis_of_qcOpenBasis (hf : OpenEmbedding f)
    (hYb : IsTopologicalBasis {S : Set Y | IsOpen S ∧ IsCompact S}) :
    IsTopologicalBasis {S : Set X | IsOpen S ∧ IsCompact S} := by
  apply isTopologicalBasis_of_isOpen_of_nhds (fun U hU ↦ hU.1) <| fun x S hx hS ↦ ?_
  obtain ⟨W, ⟨hoW, hcW⟩, ⟨hfx, hWf⟩⟩ : ∃ t ∈ {S | IsOpen S ∧ IsCompact S}, f x ∈ t ∧ t ⊆ f '' S :=
    hYb.isOpen_iff.mp (hf.open_iff_image_open.mp hS) (f x) ⟨x, hx, rfl⟩
  refine ⟨f ⁻¹' W, ⟨hoW.preimage hf.continuous, ?_⟩, ⟨hfx, fun y hy ↦ ?_⟩⟩
  · exact hf.toInducing.isCompact_preimage' hcW <| Set.SurjOn.subset_range hWf
  · exact hf.inj.mem_set_image.mp (hWf hy)

/-- This defines a spectral space as a sober (i.e. quasi-sober and T0), (quasi)-compact,
quasi-separated topological space such that all quasi-compact opens form a basis-/
class SpectralSpace (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X] extends CompactSpace X,
    QuasiSober X, QuasiSeparatedSpace X, T0Space X : Prop where
  qc_open_basis : IsTopologicalBasis {S : Set X | IsOpen S ∧ IsCompact S}

theorem compact_openEmbedding_of_SpectralSpace_is_SpectralSpace
    [SpectralSpace Y] [CompactSpace X] (hf : OpenEmbedding f) :
    SpectralSpace X where
  isCompact_univ := isCompact_univ
  sober {_} := QuasiSober.sober (self := hf.quasiSober)
  inter_isCompact :=
    have hsub : (f '' (Set.univ : Set X)) ⊆ (Set.univ : Set Y) := fun ⦃_⦄ _ ↦ Set.mem_univ _
    have hfuniv : IsQuasiSeparated (f '' (Set.univ : Set X)) := isQuasiSeparated_univ.of_subset hsub
    have hXiqs : IsQuasiSeparated (Set.univ : Set X) := hf.isQuasiSeparated_iff.mpr hfuniv
    have hXqs : QuasiSeparatedSpace X := isQuasiSeparated_univ_iff.mp hXiqs
    QuasiSeparatedSpace.inter_isCompact
  t0 x y hins :=
    have h1 := (t0Space_iff_inseparable Y).mp SpectralSpace.toT0Space (f x) (f y)
    hf.inj (h1 (hf.toInducing.inseparable_iff.mpr hins))
  qc_open_basis := hf.has_qcOpenBasis_of_qcOpenBasis SpectralSpace.qc_open_basis
```
This is just a small clean up: I suspect that the proofs can still be optimised by going over them, though.

I can try and go over the proofs and try and improve them if you think it will be helpful, but it might take me quite a bit of time. Do you think I should do that, or resubmit as it is now (i.e. with your changes)?

For the moment, if you agree with the suggestions, then simply pushing them is fine.

Streamlining results is something that everyone tries to do, until someone decides that the code is ripe!

```suggestion
quasi-separated topological space such that the quasi-compact opens form a basis. -/
```
Can you move this to an earlier file?
You can use `#find_home! OpenEmbedding.has_qcOpenBasis_of_qcOpenBasis` to find a good home for it.
Also, I think the name should be changed to `OpenEmbedding.quasiompactOpenBasis` (or else `OpenEmbedding.qcOpenBasis`, but _only if_ we are already using that abbreviation elsewhere).

```suggestion
theorem SpectralSpace.of_openEmbedding
```
or
```suggestion
theorem OpenEmbedding.spectralSpace
```
Do you expect to add notation in the future? Otherwise I would just leave out this section.
The file should be `Basic`, not `basic`

```suggestion
class IsSpectralSpace (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X] extends CompactSpace X,
```
since it's prop-valued and "spectral space" is not an adjective

I prefer
```suggestion
  quasicompact_open_basis : IsTopologicalBasis {S : Set X | IsOpen S ∧ IsCompact S}
```
